description: Update a maintenance requirement part link.
permissions: Allowed when the user can update the related maintenance requirement part per MaintenanceRequirementPartPolicy (same rules as create: admin; managers can update parts; technicians can update non-template parts for assigned requirements; operations members can update non-template parts with equipment in accessible business units; operations-with-manager-business-unit cannot update template parts; general business unit members cannot update parts).
side_effects: Updates the maintenance requirement part link record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided. quantity must be numeric and greater than 0 when provided. unit_cost must be numeric and greater than or equal to 0 when provided. source must be one of stock or purchase when provided.

flags.name: --unit-cost
flags.validation: Numeric value greater than or equal to 0.
